summary: Set of Armor, inspired by New Vegas Lonesome Road
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i62.tinypic.com/2u90hef.jpg[/img]

[youtube]lkoEX7y5Ovs[/youtube]
Whats new:
v. 1.2 Added textures without emblem. First, install main file, then install textures, confirm overwrite.
v. 1.1 Added version for SevenBase-BBP

It is my first attempt in Blender.
Its only female armor.
Outfit includes 6 items:
Duster, gloves, boots and mask - these are armored, and else top and pants - its only purpose is to cover naked skin under duster. You may wear them without duster, or Duster without them.
All items are craftable in smithig forge under Leather.
Duster was created with inspiration of NV Lonesome Road Courier|Ulysses Duster.
Other items were made with goal to look allright altogether.
Mask doesnt match any headgear in New Vegas or Skyrim, but i hope youll like it. It may remind you about other familiar game.
As it my first work, there must be something not perfect. Please report anythimg you find of that kind.

My Other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33968/]Lossless Race Change[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49598/]Serafym71 Azzi Eng Sub[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51480/]Serafym71 Wearable Teddybears UNPB-TBBP[/url]
And forgive my english - its foreign language to me.
author: Serafym71
